verses.roman:
baṅga-deśī eka vipra prabhura carite
nāṭaka kari' lañā āila prabhuke śunāite

synonyms: baṅga-deśī—from Bengal; eka vipra—one brāhmaṇa; prabhura carite—about Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's characteristics; nāṭaka kari'-making a drama; lañā—taking; āila—came; prabhuke śunāite—to induce Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to hear.
translation: A brāhmaṇa from Bengal wrote a drama about the characteristics of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and came with his manuscript to induce the Lord to hear it.
